channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Masayoshi Son Bet Billions on the iPhone—3 Years Before It Existed
item.description: How SoftBank CEO Masayoshi Son convinced Steve Jobs to make the deal of the century.

item.title: How Much Are Donald Trump’s Truth Social Shares Worth?

item.title: GitHub’s Deepfake Porn Crackdown Still Isn’t Working
item.description: Over a dozen programs used by creators of nonconsensual explicit images have evaded detection on the developer platform, WIRED has found.

item.title: Blue Origin successfully launches New Glenn rocket into space
item.description: Jeff Bezos’ spaceflight company Blue Origin launched its new mega-rocket, called New Glenn, into orbit for the first time. The rocket lifted off at 2:...

item.title: Biden's Cyber Ambassador Urges Trump Not to Cede Ground to Russia and China in Global Tech Fight
item.description: Nathaniel Fick, the ambassador for cyberspace and digital policy, has led US tech diplomacy amid a rising tide of pressure from authoritarian regimes....
